The hammer is one of many crafting tools used in GregTech. You may view recipes using the hammer with a recipe browser.
The durability of the hammer depends on the material it is created with.
Crushes ore when mining (Not Yet Implemented). Right-click to turn machine noises on/off.
This is just one example of a recipe, hammers can be crafted using most GregTech materials.
